application_gateway.description: The name of the Application Gateway.

backend_address_pool_name.description: The name of the backend address pool.

backend_http_settings_name.description: The name of the backend HTTP settings.

backend_http_settings_port.description: The port number for the backend HTTP settings.

backend_http_settings_protocol.description: The protocol for the backend HTTP settings (e.g., 'Http' or 'Https').

backend_http_settings_request_timeout.description: The request timeout for the backend HTTP settings (in seconds).

frontend_ip_configuration_name.description: The name of the frontend IP configuration.

frontend_port_name.description: The name of the frontend port.

frontend_port_port.description: The port number of the frontend port.

gateway_ip_configuration_name.description: The name of the gateway IP configuration.

http_listener_frontend_ip_configuration_.description: The name of the frontend IP configuration associated with the HTTP listener.

http_listener_frontend_port_name.description: The name of the frontend port associated with the HTTP listener.

http_listener_name.description: The name of the HTTP listener.

http_listener_protocol.description: The protocol for the HTTP listener (e.g., 'Http' or 'Https').

location.description: The location/region where the Application Gateway will be deployed.

public_ip_address_id.description: The ID of the public IP address to associate with the frontend IP configuration.

request_routing_rule_backend_address_poo.description: The name of the backend address pool associated with the request routing rule.

request_routing_rule_backend_http_settin.description: The name of the backend HTTP settings associated with the request routing rule.

request_routing_rule_http_listener_name.description: The name of the HTTP listener associated with the request routing rule.

request_routing_rule_name.description: The name of the request routing rule.

request_routing_rule_priority.description: The priority of the request routing rule.

request_routing_rule_rule_type.description: The type of the request routing rule.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Application Gateway.

sku_capacity.description: The capacity (instance count) of the SKU for the Application Gateway.

sku_name.description: The name of the SKU for the Application Gateway.

sku_tier.description: The tier of the SKU for the Application Gateway.

subnet_id.description: The ID of the subnet to which the Application Gateway should be deployed.

kubelet_identity.description: The ID of the Kubernetes Cluster Identity

dns_prefix.description: DNS prefix for the AKS cluster

node_count.description: Number of nodes in the default node pool

node_pool.description: Name of the default node pool

os_disk_size_gb.description: Size of the OS disk in GB for nodes in the default node pool

resource_group_name.description: Name of the Azure Resource Group

vm_size.description: Size of VMs in the default node pool

vnet_subnet_id.description: ID of the subnet where the AKS cluster will be deployed

container_registry_id.description: The ID of the container registry

container_sku.description: The SKU name of the Azure Container Registry.

cr_name.description: The name of the Azure Container Registry.

location.description: The location of the resource group in which to create the Azure Container Registry.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Azure Container Registry.

location.description: The location/region where the identity should be created.

name.description: The name of the user-assigned identity.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

key_vault_id.description: The ID of the created Azure Key Vault.

name.description: The ID of the created Azure Key Vault.

secrets.description: The ID of the created Azure Key Vault.

tenant_id.description: The ID of the created Azure Key Vault.

key_names.description: Names of the Azure Key Vault keys

key_sizes.description: Sizes of the Azure Key Vault keys

key_types.description: Types of the Azure Key Vault keys

key_vault_name.description: Name of the Azure Key Vault

location.description: Location for the Azure Key Vault

resource_group_name.description: Name of the Azure Resource Group

secret_names.description: Names of the Azure Key Vault secrets

secret_values.description: Values of the Azure Key Vault secrets

sku_name.description: SKU name for the Azure Key Vault

soft_delete_retention_days.description: Soft delete retention period in days

user_assigned_identity_principal_id.description: The principal ID of the user-assigned identity.

allocation_method.description: Allocation method for the Public IP

apgw_subnet.description: Name of the API Gateway Subnet

apgw_subnet_address_prefixes.description: Address prefixes for the API Gateway Subnet

apgw_vnet.description: Name of the API Virtual Network

apgw_vnet_address_space.description: Address space for the API Virtual Network

appgw_to_cluster_peering.description: Name of the peering from AppGW to Cluster VNet

cluster_subnet_address_prefixes.description: Address prefixes for the Cluster Subnet

cluster_to_appgw_peering.description: Name of the peering from Cluster to AppGW VNet

cluster_vnet.description: Name of the Cluster Virtual Network

cluster_vnet_address_space.description: Address space for the Cluster Virtual Network

public_ip.description: Name of the Azure Public IP

resource_group_name.description: Name of the Azure Resource Group

location.description: The location of the resource group in which to create the Azure Container Registry.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Azure Container Registry.

security_group_id.description: The ID of the security group
